entry.title: WRECKHOUSE WIND WARNING , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:05 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 5:30 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Wind Chill: -16
Wind: NW 36 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 80 in the Wreckhouse area late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow changing to rain or drizzle near midnight then to snow before morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 in the Wreckhouse area in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 09 February 2023
